trans-unit.source: Represents a control that creates a container that has a border and a header for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: 表示创建的容器的控件，并且在边框的标头[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]内容。

trans-unit.source: GroupBox is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, which means its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> properties can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: GroupBox 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>，这意味着其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>属性可以是任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> class.

The following illustration is an example of a GroupBox that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that are enclosed in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下图演示了包含的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，括起一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> GroupBox

trans-unit.source: ![GroupBoxImage](~/add/media/groupboximage.JPG "GroupBoxImage") ## Customizing the GroupBox Control To apply the same property settings to multiple GroupBox controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![GroupBoxImage](~/add/media/groupboximage.JPG "GroupBoxImage") # # GroupBox 控件到自定义适用于多个 GroupBox 控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the GroupBox, see [GroupBox Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于组合框的状态，请参阅[GroupBox 样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。
有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in GroupBox control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在 GroupBox 控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> class.
Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> is pressed.
Creates an implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control.
